columnName.desc: The column name that should contains the path to the file that should be batched.
columnName.name: Column name

createMissing.desc: If the file to add the properties doesn't exists, it will be created.
createMissing.name: Create missing file

csv.malformed: Your CSV is malformed: there is no column.
csv.noFileColumn: {{- col}} is not present in the provided file.
csv.noOtherColumn: There is no property in the file
csv.separator: The specified separator is invalid. You seems to use "{{- sep}}" as separator.

error.noFile: File not found, or wrong extension used.
error.noPath: The path to the batch file is empty!
error.notFound: The batch is not found at the provided path ({{- path}}).
error.notMarkdown: The plugin can only create properties for markdown file.

ignoreColumns.desc: The data in theses column won't be added in the properties.
ignoreColumns.name: Columns to ignore

openModal.desc: Open a modal displaying the results after the batch.
openModal.name: Open result

path.desc: Path to the file containing the batch properties to add
path.name: Path
path.success: File properly parsed, can be used for batching.
